name: polimi-exam-calendar
description: Adds a calendar view for exams to the Polimi exam page.

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin HEAD --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin HEAD --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin HEAD --tags
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run package && git add -A
scripts.postversion: echo 'Version updated! Push the tag to trigger release: git push origin HEAD --tags'
